altername_name: Black Panther 2: Like a Dragon Ashura Chapter
Kurohyo 2: Ryu ga Gotoku Ashura Hen
Kurohyou 2: Ryu ga Gotoku: Ashura Chapter
name: Kurohyō 2: Ryū ga Gotoku Ashura Hen
overview: Kurohyō: Ryū ga Gotoku Ashura Hen is a spin-off of the Ryū ga Gotoku series and is the sequel to the previous game in the Kurohyō side-story series. The game was once again co-developed by Sega and syn Sophia and was only released in Japan.
